text: "It is true he made a point of again being absent from Northern Rhodesia when his followers have indulged in such violence. But Sir pointed out that a few months ago Mr. Kaunda said that if UNIP did not its way what would happen would make the Mau Mau in Kenya seem like a child's picnic"
